# Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
play <card1> <card2> ... <card5> - Play the selected cards and draw new ones from the deck. You may play up to 5 cards at a time. If you play a hand, you must also respond with the intended hand type you think you are playing, and an estimate of the number of chips you think you will earn from the hand. Use the results of previous hands played to inform your estimate.
discard <card1> <card2> ... <card5> - Discard the selected cards and draw new ones from the deck. You may discard up to 5 cards at a time.
rearrange_hand <card1> <card2> ... <cardN> - Rearrange the hand of cards. Every index in the list of current cards must be present, i.e. if there are 5 cards, the indices 1-5 must be present.

reasoning:
**The Strategy is Set: Enhance the Jack, Feed the Vampire**

Okay, here's the game plan. We're in Ante 8, Round 21 with a small blind of 50,000 chips and only $72. I've got a decent hand, and, crucially, a solid joker setup. I've got the King of Spades, a Holo 9 of Spades, a couple of clubs and diamonds, and my target, a Jack of Diamonds. I also have some key jokers: Zany, Bootstraps, Four Fingers, To the Moon, Seltzer, Vampire, Baseball Card, and Hallucination.

The goal is to get 50,000 chips. "The Devil" is my consumable, so I'll be enhancing the Jack of Diamonds to a Gold card. This is essential for maximizing Vampire's potential. Vampire needs enhanced cards to function, so the "The Devil" is critical for the strategy.

Since I am playing a flush and want to maximize the vampire, I need to get rid of cards. The "Four Fingers" joker is in play. I am going to need to discard some cards after enhancing the Jack.

I need to enhance the Jack using "The Devil" and then play a hand that includes that Gold Jack, as well as the Glass King. The "Four Fingers" joker will make it simpler to build a flush. The flush will boost the scaling for Vampire.

I need to maximize the Vampire scaling. The Baseball Card provides a big multiplier because I have several uncommon jokers. So I can estimate that the Baseball Card gives a multiplier of ~7.59x and the Vampire an additional X3.5 multiplier.

To do this, I must execute the `use_consumable` action. The previous Hanged Man action has removed two cards. In the current hand, the Jack is in position 6. The Devil is in consumable slot 1. The Devil is getting used on the Jack.

Given this, the final action will be `{"action": "use_consumable", "positions": [1, 6]}`.
